page.title: 10TRANSPORT AROUND DURSLEY
page.content: In the largely rural area around Dursley the most used form of transport is the car.It is almost a necessity because of the cuts made in services provided by public transport.From Dursley itself there are regular though infrequent bus services to Cheltenham,Gloucester, Bristol,Stroud and smaller towns en route. Services have been reduced or withdrawn on economic grounds.People without cars especially the older citizens suffer by this lack of facility. Bus routes are mainly serviced by the Cheltenham and Gloucester Omnibus Company but some less frequent services providing links in the rural areas are undertaken by private firms.
